text:
Mr. Carl H. Madden
Dean
College of Business Administration
Lehigh University
Bethlehem, Pennsylvania
Dear Mr. Madden:
In regard to your letter of May 20, 1961 referring to your recent
correspondence with Mr. John L. Burns, President of RCA, please
be advised that Mr. William G. Harley is out of the country at
this time, and will be returning to Washington in early June.
Upon his return, Mr. Harley will be able to give you suggestions and
assistant in your cooperative local effort being organized in connec¬
tion with educational TV facilities at Lehigh University, and his
ideas on a “broad-guage committee" program.
Sincerely yours.
Mary Elizabeth Mcflvane
Administrative Assistant
